conceptsToExclude.name: Features occurring in fewer than 0.1% of patients

timeAtRisks.description: Intent-to-treat: 1 day after admission through day 30

psSettings.description: PS Matching - 1:1 with standardized logit caliper

predJson.name: Acid-Suppressants and COVID-19 Outcomes - South Korea HIRA Study

outcomeCohort.name: Hospitalization with Pneumonia, ARDS, Sepsis, or AKI

predJson.name: DOACs vs Warfarin for Severe Uterine Bleeding Risk in AF and VTE Populations

timeAtRisks.description: Primary on-treatment analysis: 3-day gap for DOACs, 7-day gap for warfarin, plus 5 days appended
Sensitivity analysis 1: 30-day gap for both DOACs and warfarin, no days appended

psSettings.description: Sensitivity PS strategy: variable-ratio matching up to 1:100

predJson.name: Comparative Effectiveness of Cu IUD vs LNG-IUS on Cervical Neoplasm Incidence

timeAtRisks.description: Primary Analysis: 30 days to 15 years post-IUD placement
Sensitivity Analysis: 1 year to 15 years post-IUD placement

comparatorCohort.name: New users of comparator antihyperglycemic agent on metformin monotherapy

4-point MACE (acute MI, stroke, sudden cardiac death, hospitalization for HF)

negativeControlConceptSet.name: 100 negative control outcomes with similar prevalence to study outcomes

psSettings.description: PS stratification (preferred when achieving sufficient balance)

Gall Bladder and Biliary Tract Cancer

Intent-to-Treat (ITT) - Risk from index date to end of observation or outcome
